info.author: Alexandre Norman
info.description: This is a python binding to the C libclamav library (from the Clamav project - http://www.clamav.net). It can be used to easily allow a Python script to scan a file or a buffer against known viruses.
info.name: pyclamav
info.summary: This is a python binding to the C libclamav library (from the Clamav project - http://www.clamav.net). It can be used to easily allow a Python script to scan a file or a buffer against known viruses.
